about_the_game:
Land of Nod is a Sci-Fi FPS Game. You will play soldier Hanoch to resist the oppression of Nakotus Government. As you fight against Nakotus soldiers, you will explore to discover the secret hidden on this distant colony planet.

Atmospheric Environment Design
This game uses Low-Poly to illustrate a dilapidated and mysterious extraterrestrial environment. The player will walk on land surrounded by unique vegetation and buildings to uncover secrets with battle and exploration on Planet Nod.

Suspense-Rich Story Content
120 years ago, the spaceship captain Niac and his crew landed on Planet Nod. He established the rule of the Nakotus Government. However, the Niac family has ambitions far beyond that, a conspiracy hidden in the dark which relates to not only the stable rule of the Niac family but also to the future of the entire planet and universe...

Various Weapons
10+ weapons choose freely within different attachments and fire rates. Play with your own style.
